props.name: template
props.description: The template to use in image creation.

props.name: template_version
props.description: Create image based on a specific version of the template.

props.name: modifications
props.description: A list of modifications you want to make on the template.

props.name: transparent
props.description: Render a PNG with a transparent background. Default is false.

props.name: render_pdf
props.description: Render a PDF instead of a PNG. Default is false.

props.name: metadata
props.description: Any metadata that you need to store e.g. ID of a record in your DB.

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the layer you want to change.

props.name: color
props.description: Color in hex format e.g. "#FF0000".

props.name: gradient
props.description: Fill with gradient e.g. ["#000", "#FFF"]

props.name: border_width
props.description: Width of the object border.

props.name: border_color
props.description: Border color in hex format e.g. "#FF0000".

props.name: shift_x
props.description: Shift layer along the x axis.

props.name: shift_y
props.description: Shift layer along the y axis.

props.name: target
props.description: Add a clickable link to a URL on this object when rendering a PDF.

props.name: hide
props.description: Set to true to hide a layer.

props.name: text
props.description: Replacement text you want to use.

props.name: background
props.description: Background color in hex format e.g. "#FF0000".

props.name: font_family
props.description: Change the font.

props.name: text_align_h
props.description: Horizontal alignment (left, center, right)

props.name: text_align_v
props.description: Vertical alignment (top, center, bottom)

props.name: font_family_2
props.description: Change the secondary font.

props.name: color_2
props.description: Change the secondary font color.

props.name: image_url
props.description: Change the image.

props.name: effect
props.description: Change the effect.

props.name: anchor_x
props.description: Change the anchor point (left, center, right)

props.name: anchor_y
props.description: Change the anchor point (top, center, bottom).

props.name: fill_type
props.description: Change the fill type (fill, fit).

props.name: disable_face_detect
props.description: Set to true to disable face detect for this request (if the image container is using face detect).

props.name: disable_smart_crop
props.description: Set to true to disable smart crop for this request (if the image container is using smart crop)

props.name: chart_data
props.description: Comma-delimited list of numbers to use as data.

props.name: rating
props.description: Number from 0 to 100 to use as the rating.

props.name: target
props.description: URL or text to use as the code target.

props.name: bar_code_data
props.description: Text to encode as a bar code.
